entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 34 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 34 by morning. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:39 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 31. Wind chill minus 49 in the morning and minus 44 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:39 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 30. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:39 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
